value.title: Clearview AI to Stop Facial Recognition and Delete Data, Says French Regulator

value.title: UK: US facial recognition firm Clearview AI faces £17m fine for breaching data protection law, considers appealing
value.excerpt: A US company that gathered photos of people from Facebook and other social media sites for use in facial recognition by its clients is facing a £17m fine after the Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO) found it had committed “serious breaches” of data protection law.
